parameters.description: The buffer to write JSON to
A callback to be notified when disposed
The character to write when starting (i.e., '[' for arrays)
The character to write when finishing (i.e., ']' for arrays)

content.value: Protected ReadOnly Property Buffer As StringBuilder

summary: Base class used for streaming JSON serialization.
remarks: These types are made public for third parties only for the purpose of serializing and deserializing messages that are sent across the process boundary (that is, types which implement ). Any other usage is not supported.

content.value: Public MustInherit Class JsonSerializerBase Implements IDisposable
